programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: Something in the City

programme.title: The Red House
programme.desc: 1947. Drama. Director Delmer Daves and starring Edward G Robinson, Lon McCallister, Judith Anderson and Rory Calhoun. Two girls, when told not to, explore mysterious woodland and discover secrets. [S]

programme.title: They Came to a City

programme.title: The Kidnappers
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Director: Philip Leacock. Stars: Jon Whiteley, Vincent Winter, Adrienne Corri, Duncan Macrae, Jean Anderson. Two Canadian orphans 'borrow' a baby to raise as their own. [S]

programme.title: Ladies Who Do
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Director: C.M. Pennington-Richards. Stars Peggy Mount, Robert Morley & Harry H. Corbett. A British Colonel (Morley) teams up with a cleaning lady to profit from office bin tips. [S]

programme.title: It Always Rains On Sunday
programme.desc: 1947. Drama. Director: Robert Hamer. Stars Googie Withers, John McCallum, Jack Warner & Susan Shaw. Rose wants to escape the drudgery of her daily life when an old lover escapes from prison. [S]

programme.title: They Made Me a Fugitive

programme.title: Strange But True

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: Waiting for a Knighthood. 1972. Stars Simon Oates, John Barron, Frederick Jaeger. The team investigate a case of extreme lead poisoning. Soon after, the son of an oil company magnate is kidnapped. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro has two more treats up her sleeve, with the 1957 short horror film Portraits of Terror, originally a pilot for a TV series, followed by the 1947 gothic thriller Scared to Death. [S]

programme.title: Portraits of Terror
programme.desc: 1957. Horror. Directed by Ed Wood Jr. Stars James 'Duke' Moore, Dudley Manlove & Jeannie Stevens. An actor roams an empty theatre after dark, where he is haunted by creepy sounds and eerie sights. [S]

programme.title: Scared to Death
programme.desc: 1947. Horror. Directed by Christy Cabanne. Stars Bela Lugosi, George Zucco & Molly Lamont. From the morgue, a young woman narrates the bizarre story of how she ended up there. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Next week, there's experiments, investigations and chilling horror, join Caroline Munro for a sneak peek. [S]

programme.title: Road Games
programme.desc: 1981. Thriller. Directed by Richard Franklin. Stars Jamie Lee Curtis, Stacy Keach & Marion Edward. A truck driver in Australia begins to suspect that a man is killing young women along his route. [S]

programme.desc: 1981. Thriller. Directed by Richard Franklin. Stars Jamie Lee Curtis, Stacy Keach & Marion Edward. A truck driver in Australia begins to suspect that a man is killing young women along his route. [S]

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill

programme.title: Time To Remember

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart

programme.title: Supercar

programme.title: Mystery on Bird Island
programme.desc: Family. 1954. Director: John Haggerty. Starring: Mavis Sage, Jennifer Beach & Nick Edmett. Two children on holiday, along with two local kids, catch men stealing bird eggs on the island of Burhou. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood

programme.title: Teenage Zombies

programme.desc: The electrifying Screamin' Jay Hawkins performs the 1957 song Frenzy.

programme.title: King Rat
